original_text: So the heart of Pharaoh was hardened, and he did not let the people of Israel go, just as the Lord had spoken through Moses.
korean_text: 바로의 마음이 완악하여 이스라엘 자손을 내보내지 아니하였으니 여호와께서 모세에게 말씀하심과 같더라

sentences.original_text: So the heart of Pharaoh was hardened
and he did not let the people of Israel go
just as the Lord had spoken through Moses.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 모세를 통해 말씀하신 바와 같았다.
